original_prompt: /oh-my-claude-sisyphus:sisyphus ulw before we go any further, please consider the core intention of this app (sovereign communication) so think through what a world would look like with all phones interconnected, and relaying on behalf of one-another. The internet could crash, and people could still communicate worldwide with minimal delay. Consider this audacious goal. Bring it into 3D and think about what is really going to be needed for this to work. Come up with a plan to use what we've already created, and enhance it to work fully as desired, to accommodate an apocalyptic event, and allow humanity to communicate through it all!
